staging.title: This is Staging!
staging.description: All changes made to this KAFE instance are discarded at the end of the day (around 3:00 AM).

localhost.title: This is localhost!
localhost.description: The app is connected to a locally running backend.

troubleshooting.title: Report an issue
troubleshooting.contactUs:
Did you discover a problem? 
You can send a report about what happened.
troubleshooting.sendTo: Please send us this report to <1>kafe@fi.muni.cz</1>, thank you!
troubleshooting.mailContents:
Good morning,

I experienced the following problem while using KAFE:
{{message}}

I am attaching the generated report

Thank you and have a nice day

---
troubleshooting.selectAttachments: We would appreciate as much detail as possible about the problem. However, you can choose what information you provide us:
troubleshooting.page: The page where the problem occurred
troubleshooting.user: The account that had a problem
troubleshooting.description: Please describe in as much detail as possible what went wrong:

createProject.title: Create a new project in the project group

error.projectDoesNotExist: Project with the given ID does not exist
error.subtitle: We are terribly sorry for the inconvenience. If you feel like this was not supposed to happen (which it probably wasn't), please send us the report bellow
error.title: Whops, something went wrong

home.title: Welcome to KAFE
home.subtitle: Check out, what is new!
home.noOpenGroups: There are currently no project groups open

footer.appName: Kontrol and Archival of Fantastic Entertainment

login.subtitle: to your account to access all the features of the system
login.title: Log in to KAFE
login.error: There was an error logging in, please try again!

admin.title: Reviews
admin.confirm: Careful! This will send an email to the project author! This operation is irreversible!

dramaturgy.ok: The project has been accepted to the festival
dramaturgy.nok: The project has not been accepted to the festival

file.ok: Files are uploaded and passed the automated check
file.nok: Files are not uploaded or did not pass the automated check

info.ok: Basic information is sufficiently filled out
info.nok: Basic information is not sufficiently filled out

tech.ok: The project passed the technician's check
tech.nok: The project did not pass the technician's check

visual.ok: The project passed the graphic designer's check
visual.nok: The project did not pass the graphic designer's check

projectStatus.disclaimer: The automated check is still in development. Please take the results with caution.

register.subtitle: to access your daily dose of caffeine

offline.subtitle: Please try again later

temp.after: We have sent information for activating a temporary account to your email address. Please click on the link in the email to continue to the KAFE.
temp.after2: If you did not receive the email, you can request it again.

upload.ready: Drag the <1>{{title}}</1> here<2></2>or click to select the file from your computer<4></4>
upload.uploaded: <0>Successfully uploaded</0><1></1>You can now submit the form
upload.failed: <0>Upload failed</0><1></1>Are you uploading the correct file type?

tagInput.note: Separate the roles with a comma or a new line

artifact.deleteWarn:
Are you sure you want to delete the selected artifact? 
This operation is irreversible!
artifact.noContent: The artifact does not contain any files

shards.title: Artifact parts
shards.subtitle:
Each artifact can contain several files - shards. 
A typical example can be a movie and its subtitles. These files are displayed together within a single artifact.

system.title: System settings
system.warning: Please be careful! Anything you change here can have a catastrophic impact on the final taste of KAFE! Proceed with caution!

anyone.title: Anyone on the Internet
anyone.warning: Beware, any user will have these permissions even on inherited items!

fullfilled.title: Impersonation has been initiated
fullfilled.description: Congratulations, you've clicked 10 times on an avatar and thanks to that, we'll just turn you into that person! Hold on to your hats!

noPerson.title: Impersonation was not successfull
noPerson.description: Unfortunately, this person does not have the ID listed.

cookies.description:
<1>Have you ever tried having coffee without cookies? 
Quite boring...</1><2>Cookies are important for the proper functioning of the application. 
They take care of saving your preferences and login data.</2><3>We would like to ask you for your consent to serve cookies together with KAFE.</3>
cookies.title: KAFE and cookies

organizationRedirect.title: Choose your organization
organizationRedirect.subtitle: You can switch to another organization at any time in the left panel
organizationRedirect.noOrgs: No organization available, please contact the admins... This shouldn't happen!
